text: Boysetsfire is an American post-hardcore band from Newark, Delaware. Boysetsfire has five members in the band; the current band members are Nathan Gray, Chad Istvan, Robert Ehrenbrand, Josh Latshaw and Matt Krupanski. ==Band members== ;Current *Nathan Gray – lead vocals, keyboard *Josh Latshaw – guitar, backing vocals *Chad Istvan – guitar, backing vocals, piano, keyboard *Robert Ehrenbrand – bass guitar, backing vocals *Matt Krupanski - drums ;Former *Rob Avery - Bass guitar *Darrell Hyde - Bass guitar ==Discography== So far as of 2015, Boysetsfire has released 6 studio albums: ===Albums=== * The Day the Sun Went Out (1997) * After the Eulogy (2000) * Tomorrow Come Today (2003) * The Misery Index: Notes from the Plague Years (2006) * While a Nation Sleeps... (2013) * Boysetsfire (2015) ==Other websites== * Official website Category:1990s American music groups Category:2000s American music groups Category:2010s American music groups Category:American punk bands Category:Post-hardcore bands Category:Musicians from Delaware Category:Newark, Delaware Category:Musical groups established in 1994 Category:1994 establishments in the United States Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2007 Category:2007 disestablishments in the United States Category:Musical groups established in 2010 Category:2010 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Delaware
title: Boysetsfire
